org.apache.catalina.users

类 AbstractRole

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.catalina.users.AbstractRole
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Principal, Role
    直接已知子类:
    MemoryRole

    public abstract class AbstractRole
extends Object
implements Role

    Convenience base class for Role implementations.

    从以下版本开始:
    4.1
